Class PlotAPI

extends java.lang.Object

      • getWorldSettings

        public PlotWorld getWorldSettings(org.bukkit.World world)
        Get the settings for a world (settings bundled in PlotWorld class) - You will need to downcast for the specific settings a Generator has. e.g. DefaultPlotWorld class implements PlotWorld
        Parameters:
        world - (to get settings of)
        Returns:
        PlotWorld class for that world ! will return null if not a plot world world
        See Also:
